title: Gandalf, The Grey Wizard (1P364)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Companion • Wizard
Strength:	7
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Gandalf
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert Gandalf to play a companion who has the Gandalf signet. The twilight cost of that companion is -2.
Lore:	”…his long white hair, his sweeping silver beard, and his broad shoulders, made him look like some wise king of ancient legend.”
Rarity:	P
